name: Google Meet Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Google Meet subagent capabilities including space management, conference records, recordings, and transcripts. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: create a meet room
items.expected_output: Create new Google Meet space/room.

items.input: start a google meet now
items.expected_output: Create new Meet space immediately and return join link.

items.input: get meeting details for space ABC123
items.expected_output: Get Meet space details by space ID/name.

items.input: end the active meeting
items.expected_output: 1. Get active conference. 2. End active conference in space.

items.input: list my past conferences
items.expected_output: List conference records for past meetings.

items.input: get recording for yesterday's standup
items.expected_output: 1. List conference records. 2. Find standup from yesterday. 3. Get recordings by conference record ID.

items.input: show participants from the team meeting
items.expected_output: 1. List conference records. 2. Find team meeting. 3. List participant sessions.

items.input: get transcripts from the client call
items.expected_output: 1. List conference records. 2. Find client call. 3. Get transcripts by conference record ID.

items.input: who joined the budget review meeting
items.expected_output: 1. List conference records. 2. Find budget review meeting. 3. List participant sessions.

items.input: get conference record for meeting XYZ
items.expected_output: Get conference record details by conference record ID.

items.input: create google meet with restricted access
items.expected_output: Create Meet space with access type configured for restricted access.

items.input: update meeting space settings
items.expected_output: 1. Get current space. 2. Update space settings.
items.context: User wants to modify meeting settings

items.input: list recordings from this week
items.expected_output: 1. List conference records from this week. 2. Get recordings for each.

items.input: get participant session for john in last meeting
items.expected_output: 1. List conference records. 2. Find last meeting. 3. Get participant session for john.

items.input: create gogle meet room
items.expected_output: 1. Recognize 'gogle' as typo for 'google'. 2. Create new Meet space.

items.input: show all transcripts
items.expected_output: List conference records and their available transcripts.
items.context: User wants to see all transcripts

items.input: end conference in meeting room ABC
items.expected_output: 1. Get space ABC. 2. End active conference in that space.
items.context: User wants to end specific meeting

items.input: how long was the interview meeting
items.expected_output: 1. List conference records. 2. Find interview meeting. 3. Calculate duration from start/end times.

items.input: get all recordings for conference record 12345
items.expected_output: Get recordings by conference record ID.
items.context: User wants recordings for specific conference

items.input: when did the sprint planning meeting happen
items.expected_output: 1. List conference records. 2. Find sprint planning meeting. 3. Return start time.
